post:
Hello,
We've got a new node in Münster, Germany and here's our new *KVM * offer, also do note, these will be provisioned only on our Münster Node and not on the North Carolina Node !

All the Münster, Germany VPS's come with,
1 GBit shared line
Dedicated RAM 
4 (8 HT Cores) Shared Cores of Intel Xeon E3-1230 Processor at 3.2 Ghz each core and 3.6 Ghz Max Turbo Frequency ! 
1 Static IPv4
SolusVM

KVM Plan Details :
1 GB Guaranteed RAM
10 GB HDD
500 GB Bandwidth at 1 Gbit/sec
SolusVM Control Panel
4 (8 HT Cores) Shared Cores of Intel Xeon E3-1230 Processor at 3.2 Ghz each core and 3.6 Ghz Max Turbo Frequency !
Price : $7/month

Order Link :
https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=37

Test IP : 62.113.214.137
Location : Münster, Germany
IPv6 Info : DC has it, we'll get it soon.
Terms And Conditions and Acceptable User Policy of our VPS Hosting Service : http://wiki.crowncloud.net/doku.php?id=vps_tos

Contact us at support@crowncloud.net if you need any pre-sales info or support.
or join us on IRC at #CrownCloud on FreeNode !

Live chat : http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=CrownCloud&uio=d4

All orders are manually processed and may take upto 12 hours for activation, Please use a valid email when signing up as the details of the VPS will be emailed to you, All VPS's on the Münster, Germany Node come with a 1 Gbit Shared line.

Supported OS for KVM,
Any OS, provide us the link to the legal ISO (Not pirated) and we'll make it available for you to install.
For Windows, You'll have to bring your own License and ISO..

Contact us at support@crowncloud.net if you need any pre-sales info or support.
or join us on IRC at #CrownCloud on FreeNode !

Live chat : http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=CrownCloud&uio=d4

Thanks !
